name: 2021_NS-16_LOST_PIONEER_PLAQUE(???)
description:
Reappropriation of the plate that Linda Salzman Sagan drew and that Carl Sagan, along with Frank Drake, designed for the Pioneer 10 and Pioneer 11 probes, launched in the 70's.

The intention of the original plate was to inform the existence of the human being, and his place of origin, to a possible extraterrestrial civilization.
The intention of this plaque is to inform the existence of billionaire white men, and the place they have taken over, to a possible extraterrestrial civilization.

12''||1080x1080px||30fps
